sentence.Network_en: Persistent damage or inadequate healing may lead to chronic lameness.
sentence.Network_cn: 反复受伤或治疗不当可导致长期跛足。

sentence.Network_en: Having been laughed at for his lameness, the boy became shy and inhibited.
sentence.Network_cn: 那男孩因跛脚被人讥笑, 变得羞怯而压抑.

sentence.Network_en: By reason of his lameness the boy could not play games.
sentence.Network_cn: 这男孩因脚跛不能做游戏.
